external_references.description: A. Kumar, K. Del Rosso, J. Albrecht, C. Hebeisen. (2020, June 1). Mobile APT Surveillance Campaigns Targeting Uyghurs - A collection of long-running Android tooling connected to a Chinese mAPT actor. Retrieved November 10, 2020.

objects.description: [CarbonSteal](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0529) has collected device network information, including 16-bit GSM Cell Identity, 16-bit Location Area Code, Mobile Country Code (MCC), and Mobile Network Code (MNC). [CarbonSteal](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0529) has also called `netcfg` to get stats.(Citation: Lookout Uyghur Campaign)
